definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Ex 8:2 (cf. also Albr:ZAW xv (1895), 322 Ges:§ § 135 o 145 o) frogs (Ar. d.ifd.i9un, etc.; Aram. [[עוּדְּעָנַיָּא]], [[זוּרְדְּעָא]], 0urd9o0);—frogs, coll. Ex 8:2, Ps 78:45; pl. [[חִפַרְדְּעִים]] Ex 7:27, Ex 7:28, Ex 7:29, Ex 8:1, Ex 8:3, Ex 8:4, Ex 8:5, Ex 8:7, Ex 8:8, Ex 8:9, Ps 105:30.
